segments.text: Oh , don't talk to me about yesterday ! It was the most awful evening I've ever had .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well.John had promised to be my date , but he stood me up . I waited for a full hour in the cold wind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So how long did you stay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I left after the opening dance . I couldn't wait to get out of there .
segments.speaker: S1
